title: Lag Spikes Only in Teamfights?
body:
During a game of draft, i was experiencing major lag spikes when anyone comes to gank mid lane, or when 3 or more people appear in the screen at the same time. I do not know if this is a result of my annoying ass family, Canada, full storage, or opened tabs, but will someone please give me an explanation on why this is happening and/or how to fix it. 

Ex: 
What I want: Ahri (me) uses spirit rush + flash to a q,e,r combo on an ulting Vel'koz, and uses the remaining two charges of her ult to swiftly escape from the approaching Shyvanna.
Reality: Ahri (me) flashes with a delay of 2 seconds and does not cast anything, thus ends up getting killed by Vel'koz and the approaching Shyvanna. At the grey screen, a barrage of 4 or more turret shots appear.

Currently, I am using League's newest client, Version: (idk but its the new client) 

Aftermath: A raging {{champion:103}} _seriously_ considering deleting League and downloading Overwatch.

replies.body: You may be having a network problem like packet loss, which means that information betwen you and the game is getting delayed or lost.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's happening.  Let me know what you find!

Thanks for the follow-up!  It sounds like we're making progress but there's some instability in your connection.  The Log Reader is great at finding issues, but I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to really tune up your network.  It may have some steps that the log reader already provided, but it's important to go over each one to rule out possibilities.  I hope that helps!
